import React from 'react' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import ExerciseList from './components/ExerciseList' import Sidebar from './components/Sidebar' import PlanList from './components/PlanList' import {useCookies} from 'react-cookie'; import {useHistory ,BrowserRouter, Switch, Route} from 'react-router-dom' import Login from './components/Login' import {CookiesProvider} from 'react-cookie' import TrainingPlan from './components/TrainingPlan' import LogOut from './components/LogOut' import './App.css'; import { Layout } from './components/Layout' function App() { const [plans, setPlans] = useState([]) const [editPlan,setEditPlan] = useState(null) const [exercises, setExercises] = useState([]) const [token, setToken, removeToken] = useCookies(['mytoken']) const history = useHistory() useEffect(() => { fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/plans-list', { 'method':'GET', headers: { 'Content-Type':'application/json', 'Authorization':`Token ${token['mytoken']}`, } }) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(resp => setPlans(resp)) fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/exercise-list', { 'method':'GET', headers: { 'Content-Type':'application/json', } }) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(resp => setExercises(resp)) }, [token]) return (

Homepage


{/* */}
) } export default App;
